abstract: Running back’s 4-yard run is the game’s first touchdown.
lead_paragraph: Derrick Henry took a direct snap and plowed his way into the end zone on a 4-yard run, giving the Titans an early 10-0 lead. The run was the culmination of a 58-yard drive in which Tennessee rolled the dice on a fourth-and-2 play from Kansas City’s 29-yard line rather than attempt a long field goal.
